hey all, does anyone know how I could execute dinamic tests methods
using J=
unit? I mean, I have a framework that uses xml configuration
and XPATH to m=
ake some assertion tests from our server, and I would
like to run them usin=
g junit, as it would be easier to generate
reports and so on. The problem i=
s that the tests are dinamic and
depend on an external configuration file. =
So if i do asserts inside a
loop it would leave the method on the first fai=
l/error, is there any
way to store all the asserts and process them afterwa=
rds? what would
you suggest?

thanks
